items.sentence: I really don't understand why this is happening.
That's not the main reason Tom wants to do that.
If only you could've stayed a little bit longer.
It never crossed my mind that Tom would do that.
I was hoping that someone would help me do this.
I don't think that this is going to be much fun.
I turned on the heater because it was very cold.
It's possible to survive on just rice and beans.
It's doubtful anything will get done here today.
Tom wished Mary had told him about that earlier.
I've been reading and writing email all morning.
Tom doesn't have to wear glasses when he drives.
Tom doesn't have to be the first one to do that.
Tom has been confined to a bed for three months.
Tom has been a basketball coach for three years.
Tom isn't the one who usually washes the dishes.
I don't like anyone to intrude when I'm working.
Tom cooked Mary meals while she was sick in bed.
Tom will likely be here in about thirty minutes.
Tom got arrested for being drunk and disorderly.
